projects.title: Blogstagram
projects.description: Users can create accounts, log in, and manage their profiles. This ensures that only authorized individuals can publish and manage blog posts.

projects.title: Quiz App.
projects.description: This app offers a wide range of exciting quizzes across various topics, from general knowledge to specific subjects, ensuring there's something for everyone.

projects.title: Live Code Editor.
projects.description: The preview pane dynamically renders the code as users type, allowing them to see the visual representation of their code in real- time. This feature is especially useful for web development projects.

projects.title: Github Battle App.
projects.description: With the React Github Battle App, you can enter the usertitle of two Github users and witness an epic showdown between their profiles. The app fetches information such as followers, repositories, and popular programming languages, allowing you to compare and evaluate their developer progress.

projects.title: Monthly Activity Tracker.
projects.description: An application that gives users the tools and support they need to stay on top of their activities and goals for the month, and make consistent and measurable progress towards achieving them.

projects.title: XOXO - Tic Tac Toe
projects.description: An application that gives users the tools and support they need to stay on top of their activities and goals for the month, and make consistent and measurable progress towards achieving them.
